metadata.name: Scheduled Task Executed From A Suspicious Location
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of Scheduled Tasks where the Program being run is located in a suspicious location or it's an unusale program to be run from a Scheduled Task

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM scheduled_job_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (metadata.event_code = 129 AND (contains(lower(job.file.path), lower('c:\\windows\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(job.file.path), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(job.file.path), lower('\\desktop\\')) OR contains(lower(job.file.path), lower('\\downloads\\')) OR contains(lower(job.file.path), lower('\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(job.file.path), lower('c:\\temp\\'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of Scheduled Tasks where the Program being run is located in a suspicious location or it's an unusale program to be run from a Scheduled Task

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown Reference: Internal Research
